widget.name: iFrame widget
widget.short_description: The widget allows to forward lead id to iframe with any site
widget.description: The widget allows to forward lead id to iframe with any site
widget.tour_description: The widget allows to forward lead id to iframe with any site

settings.siteLink: Link to the site where we get iframe
settings.getParam: Name of the GET param of lead id
settings.modalWidth: Modal width (1200 by default, not required)
settings.modalHeight: Modal height (800 by default, not required)
